text: @realTuckFrumper Crazy as the Cult leader who believes the coronavirus will disappear in April with the warm weather! Watch what they do. Do not listen to what they say. Actions speak louder than words! #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica #VoteBlueNoMatterWho2020 #VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare
